thread.section_title: Vital Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vital Choice | vitalchoice.com
thread.title: JP

author: JP
title: JP
text:
I tried Vital Choice to find wild caught seafood which was required for a clean eating plan I was attempting for the new year. Wild caught seafood is inconsistently available and not always fresh so was hoping Vital Choice would be able to provider a higher quality product. Glad to report the product was not only high quality but the customer service was also. I was concerned that I would not be home for my delivery and the customer service agent that fielded my call assured me that Vital Choice plans and packs their delivery so that it could withstand to the end of the day when I would come home from work in the evening. She was very sweet and explained how it is packed so I would not worry.
Thank you Vital Choice. Will shop again.
